properties.linkedServiceName: <Name of the linked service that refers to an Azure Data lake store. This linked service must be of type: AzureDataLakeStore>

typeProperties.folderPath: <Path to the folder in the data lake store. Example: myfolder/yearno={Year}/monthno={Month}/dayno={Day}. The below optional property 'partitionedBy' is required to specify dynamic partitions. Remove 'partitionedBy' if the path is static>
typeProperties.fileName: <File name in the data lake store>

availability.frequency: <Specifies the time unit for data slice production.Supported frequency:Minute, Hour, Day, Week, Month>
availability.interval: <Specifies the interval within the defined frequency. frequency set to 'Hour' and interval set to 1 indicates new data slices produced hourly>
